member.summary: Toggle microphone capture.

member.summary: The Game Bar command originated from Cortana.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices
member.summary: Manages the state of the Game Bar.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.AppBroadcastServices
member.summary: Gets an object that manages app broadcasts.
member.returns: An object that manages app broadcasts.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.AppCaptureServices
member.summary: Gets an object that manages app capture.
member.returns: An object that manages app capture.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.SessionId
member.summary: Gets a unique identifier for the Game Bar session.
member.returns: A unique identifier for the Game Bar session.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.TargetCapturePolicy
member.summary: Gets the policy for app capture of a target.
member.returns: The policy for app capture of a target.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.TargetInfo
member.summary: Gets an object that provides metadata for an app capture target.
member.returns: An object that provides metadata for an app capture target.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.CommandReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a Game Bar command is received.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.DisableCapture
member.summary: Disables app capture.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServices.EnableCapture
member.summary: Enables app capture.

member.summary: Provides data for the GameBarServices.CommandReceived event.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServicesCommandEventArgs.Command
member.summary: Gets a value specifying the Game Bar command associated with the event.
member.returns: A value specifying the Game Bar command associated with the event.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServicesCommandEventArgs.Origin
member.summary: Gets a value specifying the origin of the Game Bar command.
member.returns: A value specifying the origin of the Game Bar command.

member.summary: Occurs when the GameBarServices object is created.

member.summary: Gets the default instance of the GameBarServiceManager class.

member.summary: Provides data for the GameBarServicesManager.GameBarServicesCreated event.

member.summary: Provides metadata about a Game Bar services target.

member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the Game Bar services target app.
member.returns: The unique identifier of the Game Bar services target app.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarServicesTargetInfo.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the display mode of the Game Bar services target app.
member.returns: A value indicating the display mode of the Game Bar services target app.

member.summary: Gets the display name of the Game Bar services target app.
member.returns: The display name of the Game Bar services target app.

member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the Game Bar services target title.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy
member.summary: Provides information around the allowable actions for this application.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy.EnabledBySystem
member.summary: The OS determined that the target allows capture

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy.EnabledByUser
member.summary: The OS does not know the policy for the app, but the user did identify the target as capturable.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy.NotEnabled
member.summary: The OS doesn’t know the policy for the app and hasn’t been identified by the user as capturable.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy.ProhibitedByPublisher
member.summary: The publisher of the target has indicated that capture is not allowed.

member.name: F:Windows.Media.Capture.GameBarTargetCapturePolicy.ProhibitedBySystem
member.summary: The OS determined that the target is prohibited from being captured.
